title: Wrong Answer
description: If you answer incorrectly, take a shot.

title: Correct Answer
description: If you answer correctly, everyone else takes a shot.

title: First to Answer
description: The first player to answer correctly gets to assign a shot to another player.

title: Slow Starter
description: If you are the last to answer, take two shots.

title: Majority Vote
description: If most players answer incorrectly, everyone takes a shot.

title: Host's Choice
description: The host assigns a shot to any player after each round.

title: Round Robin
description: Each player takes a shot in order after each round.

title: Double or Nothing
description: If you answer correctly after a wrong answer, skip your next shot.

title: Lag Penalty
description: If your answer takes longer than 10 seconds, take an extra shot.

title: Steal the Shot
description: If you answer correctly, you can pass your shot to another player.

title: Chain Reaction
description: If three players answer incorrectly in a row, everyone takes a shot.

title: Sore Winner
description: If you answer correctly and mock another player, take a shot.

title: Wrong Streak
description: If you get three wrong answers in a row, take three shots.

title: Lucky Guess
description: If you guess correctly without knowing the answer, take a shot.

title: Debunker
description: If you correct the host's mistake, the host takes a shot.

title: Speedster
description: If you answer first and correctly, everyone else takes a shot.

title: Blindside
description: If you answer incorrectly and no one else does, take two shots.

title: Group Punishment
description: If everyone answers incorrectly, everyone takes a shot.

title: Leaderboard Shame
description: The player with the most wrong answers takes a shot.

title: Host's Fault
description: If the host makes a mistake in the question, the host takes a shot.
